name: Paints of mind
description:
This is a story of an artist who cannot finish his picture for a long time. It doesn’t matter how many tries he got; every sketch is thrown into a trash bin. The artist decides to go deep inside to find his inspiration. However, he is carried away by his conscious and is locked inside it.

After multiple failed tries to get out a darkness appeared inside which is going to devour everything. Our hero decided to overcome darkness and wants to understand what helped him to be creative for this time before.

Genre: Quest You need to move between the levels to find three light which opens door out of this place.

However, it needs to do it quick because shadows thicken around, create arms which tries to pull you away. When you find the first light there will be displayed above the character. You will be able to click ‘Space’ to take an action (move to the level, suppress the shadows). We place one “Easter egg” in our game. Can you find it?
